main_quests.title: Prove Your Strength
main_quests.description: Defeat 20 mobs in the forest to begin your journey.
main_quests.lore: The forest is teeming with dangers. Only those who prove their might can venture further.

main_quests.title: Endure the Climb
main_quests.description: Defeat the formidable mountain boss to prove your endurance.
main_quests.lore: High on the rugged slopes, the mountain guardian stands as the first true test of your resolve.

main_quests.title: Survive the Sands
main_quests.description: Defeat the Desert Pharaoh to tame the scorching sands.
main_quests.lore: Beneath the burning sun, the ancient Desert Pharaoh awaits—its defeat is key to mastering the sands.

main_quests.title: Cleanse the Swamp
main_quests.description: Defeat the Swamp Witch to purge the corruption.
main_quests.lore: In the murky depths, the Swamp Witch festers—her defeat will purify the land and open the path forward.

main_quests.title: Echoes of Power
main_quests.description: Win a battle in the mysterious caves to unlock the final realm.
main_quests.lore: Deep within the caves, echoes of an ancient power call out. Triumph here to earn passage to the Castle.

side_quests.title: Win 10 Mob Battles
side_quests.description: Win 10 battles against mobs to begin your campaign.

side_quests.title: Win 25 Mob Battles
side_quests.description: Continue and win 25 battles against mobs to prove your strength.

side_quests.title: Win 50 Mob Battles
side_quests.description: Achieve ultimate honor by winning 50 battles against mobs.

side_quests.title: Defeat 5 Bosses
side_quests.description: Defeat 5 bosses to demonstrate your valor.

side_quests.title: Defeat 10 Bosses
side_quests.description: Continue your adventure and defeat 10 bosses.

side_quests.title: Defeat 20 Bosses
side_quests.description: Prove your endurance by defeating 20 bosses.

side_quests.title: Slay the Dark Lord
side_quests.description: Defeat the feared Dark Lord in battle.

side_quests.title: Defeat the Frost Wyrm
side_quests.description: Take down the chilling Frost Wyrm.

side_quests.title: Crush the Giant
side_quests.description: Survive the brutal battle against the Giant.

side_quests.title: Stake the Vampire
side_quests.description: Vanquish the Vampire lurking in the swamp.
